Dec. 1, 1973 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK
Best section 2 band - Alloa. Best section 3 band - Peebles. Best section 4 band - RNR Tay Division. Best instrumentalist - Charles Calder (cornet) Broxburn. Best basses - Broxburn. 30 bands competed.
